Question: Julian started to see his father regularly, and this person gave him a drumming part on a Walls and Bridges track.
Hints: This person was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1987 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1994.
This person delighted in mocking Epstein for his homosexuality and for the fact that he was Jewish.
After arriving home at Kenwood, and finding this person with Ono, Cynthia left the house to stay with friends.
